fetch.description: Fetch a webpage and convert it to markdown format. Optionally render JavaScript, include raw HTML, or extract images.

props.name: url
props.description: The URL of the webpage to fetch

props.name: renderJs
props.description: Render JavaScript on the webpage before fetching

props.name: includeRawHtml
props.description: Include the raw HTML in the response

search.description: Search the web for relevant content based on a natural language query. Perfect for grounding LLM responses with factual data.

props.name: q
props.description: The natural language question or query to search for

props.name: depth
props.description: Standard returns results faster; deep takes longer but yields more comprehensive results

props.name: outputType
props.description: Format of the response. Use structured for custom JSON format.

props.name: structuredOutputSchema
props.description: JSON schema (as a string) for the desired response format. Required only when Output Type is "structured".

props.name: includeSources
props.description: Include sources in the response. Only relevant when Output Type is "structured".

props.name: fromDate
props.description: Start date for search results in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD), e.g., 2025-01-01

props.name: toDate
props.description: End date for search results in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD), e.g., 2025-01-01

props.name: includeDomains
props.description: Domains to search within (up to 100 domains). Leave empty to search all domains.

props.name: excludeDomains
props.description: Domains to exclude from search results

props.name: includeInlineCitations
props.description: Include inline citations in the answer. Only relevant when Output Type is "sourcedAnswer".

props.name: maxResults
props.description: Maximum number of results to return
